definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: This new mystery show is one of the ten best of the season.
sentences.chinese: 這部新的懸念劇是這個季度十佳電視劇之一。

sentences.english: That series s selling point was not just sex and designer clothes.
sentences.chinese: 這一電視劇的賣點不僅只是性和名牌服裝。

sentences.english: A unique narrative strategy is to narrative drama of a pioneering approach.
sentences.chinese: 全劇獨特的敘事策略是對電視劇敘事手法的一種開拓。

sentences.english: Kira: Don't tell me anything about it, especially spoilers .
sentences.chinese: 什麼也不要告訴我，尤其是有關電視劇結尾的信息。

sentences.english: but I can't find a good drama.
sentences.chinese: 但我都找不到好看的電視劇了。

sentences.english: The TV placdfds. com made her moved.
sentences.chinese: 這部電視劇令她非常感動。

sentences.english: Meet the new stars of Showtime.
sentences.chinese: 來認識一下這些電視劇的新明星。

sentences.english: Chen Jian Bin, he played Cao Cao in the new Three Kingdoms drama.
sentences.chinese: 陳建斌，他在最新的三國電視劇中演了曹操。

sentences.english: American teleplays are very popular in the Web in China.
sentences.chinese: 美國電視劇在中國網絡形成了熱播。

sentences.english: There are 2 main categories for fictional television series, drama and comedy.
sentences.chinese: 美式電視劇分爲正劇和喜劇兩大類。

sentences.english: A new television series is the latest dramatisation of the Camelot myth.
sentences.chinese: 最近上映的一部電視劇是以卡米洛特的神話爲題材的。

sentences.english: The aesthetics pursue of teleplay is "the aestheticization of everyday life".
sentences.chinese: 電視劇的美學追求是“日常生活的審美化”。

sentences.english: Love is like two halves of the same shell - a perfect match.
sentences.chinese: 愛是是兩個人一起拼成一顆心在線看電視劇掩護。

sentences.english: Some TV shows are full of exaggeration and lack trueness to life.
sentences.chinese: 現在的有些電視劇，情節夸誕，缺乏生活中的真實性。

sentences.english: TV is as good as it gets because the form forces the writers to be better.
sentences.chinese: 電視劇本精彩絕倫，因爲這一體制迫使作者做得更好。

sentences.english: As to the most convulsed TV Series, it's not important. I think <
sentences.chinese: 至於所說的“最雷人電視劇”，我想這並不重要吧。

script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
cast and crew/performers and production team
